thread.section_title: Mercure Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Courbevoie, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: avoid if possible
thread.title_full: avoid if possible - Review of Mercure Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: Traveling_brand
title: avoid if possible
text:
I have stayed here several times per year the past 15 years. The hotel has not upgraded since then and what used to be a decent hotel has now downgraded into a "dump a bus of tourists" hotel. Small rooms, grotty, not kept up. If you are here for business I would avoid, better ones are nearby. The staff is friendly but the price is way too high for this lack of quality.
Room Tip: different hotel See more room tips
